Él comenta que tuvo un efecto positivo con la inversión del préstamo anterior, ya que sus cultivos fueron sanos, obteniendo buenos resultados, con esto tambien ha sido beneficiada su familia.
texts.en:
Mateo has had a good experience with loans, so he is applying again, since he feels that it is a good way to work and to move ahead. Now this loan will be used to pay for laborers to harvest his crop of maicillo (similar to millet) and also to rent a thresher and pay for transportation to bring it closer to his home.

He comments that he had positive results from investing the previous loan, since his crops were healthy, obtaining good results, and this has also benefited his family.

loans.use: to pay laborers to harvest his crops

loans.name: Tserendorj

texts.en:
Tserendorj is a-39-year-old married man who lives with his family in a Mongolian traditional felt tent – ger in Ulaanbaatar city, Mongolia.  The tent is in his brother’s plot of land on outer ger district, and does not have basic infrastructure   Both of his son and daughter attend local secondary school while their mother works as a teacher at kindergarten. 

Tserendorj supports his family by operating a hand made art business for more than ten years.  He makes a traditional Mongolian masks from paper, horse whip from silver and saddle from wood. Currently, he plans to make a whip, but his silver isn’t enough. Also this is his second Kiva loan and now he is requesting a 2.100.000 Mongolian Tugriks (MNT) loan to purchase necessary 1.116 gr. silver.

loans.use: to purchase 1.116gr. silver

loans.name: Maria Belen

texts.en: Maria Belen is 50 years old and lives in Macabayao, Jimenez, Misamis Occidental, Philippines. She is a married woman. Maria Belen has a gardening business as her source of income. Maria Belen earns 3,000 Philippine pesos (PHP) every month doing this business. She has been engaged in this business for two years. Maria Belen requested a loan of 7,000 PHP from GDMPC to purchase additional seeds, seedlings, and young crops to raise. In 2011, Maria Belen became a member of GDMPC. In the future, Maria Belen hopes to expand and improve her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional seeds, seedlings, and young crops to raise

loans.name: Everine

texts.en:
Everine is a 33-year-old woman with four children. She lives in Kagadi, Uganda. She has been operating a retail shop for five years. She started her business with capital she received from her husband.

Everine dreams of educating her children and owning a wholesale shop. She has a problem with customers who take goods on credit and then delay their payments. Everine requests a loan to buy sugar, soap and maize flour to sell.

loans.use: to buy sugar, soap and maize flour to sell.

loans.name: James

texts.en:
James is 40 years old and married with six children. He sells oranges and bananas to earn a living. He has been in this business for two years. He describes his business environment as good because there is limited competition. 

Since he joined Faulu Kenya, James has been able to expand his business and hopes to be financially stable in the future. He has applied for 20,000 KES to buy bananas and oranges to sell.

loans.use: To buy bananas and oranges to sell.

loans.name: Njeri

texts.en:
Njeri is 48 years old. She is an enterprising business lady who is married to Moses, a businessman. They are blessed with two children. She has been selling new shoes for the past year and earns a monthly income of KES 15,000, which she uses to support her family.

Njeri is applying for her first loan term with KADET LTD, after being introduced by an existing KADET customer. Njeri will use the loan to buy new shoes for her shop. 

With the anticipated profit from the business, she will educate her children. Her hopes and dreams are to open a wholesale shop.

loans.use: To buy new shoes for her shop.

loans.name: Ma. Nancy

texts.en: This time, Ma. Nancy is borrowing 11,000 PHP to fund her general store business. The fish vending business that she previously funded through NWTF and Kiva continues to provide Ma. Nancy and her family with income that is improving their quality of life.

loans.use: to buy items to sell in her sari-sari store, like shampoo and groceries

loans.name: Neneta

texts.en: This time, Neneta is borrowing 15,000 PHP to fund her fish vending business. The fish vending business that she previously funded through NWTF and Kiva continues to provide her additional working capital to build and expand her business operations.

loans.use: to buy more fish to sell in her food stall.

loans.name: Cecilia

texts.es:
Cecilia es estudiante de turismo y trabaja como empleada doméstica. El crédito lo requiere para pagar sus estudios del siguiente semestre y posteriormente  ayudar a su familia consiguiendo un mejor trabajo en su profesión.

Cecilia vive con sus padres en una casa alquilada en la zona de Llojeta de la ciudad de La Paz. Ella es soltera no tiene hijos.
 
Es la primera vez que trabaja con IMPRO y la primera vez junto a KIVA.
texts.en:
Cecilia is a tourism student, and she works as a domestic employee.  She needs the loan to pay for next semester’s studies.  She will later help her family by getting a better job in her profession.

Cecilia lives with her parents in a rented house in the Llojeta area of the city of La Paz.  She is single and does not have children.

This is the first time she has worked with IMPRO, and the first time she has worked with Kiva.

loans.use: to pay for her next semester in her Tourism career studies.

loans.name: Egda Elena Dolores

texts.es:
EL Banco Comunal Avance Y Desarrollo se reúne cada quince días en el cantón Junín, este lugar se lo conoce por su gente amable y trabajadora y porque en este lugar se destila el mejor aguardiente en la provincia y en el Ecuador.

En este lugar conocimos a la señora Egda, tiene 53 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen seis hijos todos ellos mayores de edad, dos de ellos aun viven con ella a pesar de que uno de ellos ya está casado. Su esposo es agricultor.

Para ganar algo y con esto ayudar a su esposo que no gana mucho en sus labores en el campo, ella se dedica a la preparación y venta de dulces y bollos,  todos los días realiza sus ventas y que los sabados y domingos que es cuando más turistas hay  instala un pequeño puesto a las orillas de la vía principal para vender sus productos a los clientes que pasan por el lugar. Lleva más de 10 años dedicada a esta actividad y gracias a esto a podido sacar adelante a sus hijos.

Este crédito es para comprar víveres para preparar sus productos. Lleva 15 años  en el Banco Comunal, esta desde el inicio y le gusta por los beneficios que recibe del banco.
 
Sus sueños son tener un restaurante y salud para ella y los suyos.
texts.en:
The Avance Y Desarrollo community bank meets twice a month in Junin, a canton known for its friendly, hard-working people and the excellent liquor that's produced here and famous everywhere in Ecuador.
 
Our member, Egda, is 53 years old. She is married and has six grown children.  Two of her children still live at home, even though one of the two is now married. Egda's husband is a farmer.  

Egda started a business of her own to help out with family expenses.  She makes and sells snacks, working every day of the week.  There's more traffic--especially tourists--in the area on Saturdays and Sundays, so she sets up a small stand by the side of the main road those days to sell to passers-by.  Egda has operated her own business for 10 years and her income from it has allowed her to better provide for her children.

Edga will use this loan to buy supplies for her snacks sales business.  She has been a member of her community bank for 15 years.

Her hopes for the future are a restaurant of her own and good health for herself and her family.

loans.use: to buy supplies for her food sales business.

loans.name: Mariana De Jesús

texts.es:
EL Banco Comunal Avance Y Desarrollo se reúne cada quince días en el cantón Junín, este lugar se lo conoce por su gente amable y trabajadora y porque en este lugar se destila el mejor aguardiente en la provincia y en el Ecuador.

En este lugar conocimos a la señora Mariana, tiene 38 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen tres hijos de  17, 13 y 5 años de edad, los dos mayores estudian en colegio y el menor en  escuela. Su esposo es comerciante.

Ella realiza el crédito para el negocio del esposo el cual se dedican  compra y venta de frutas, plátano y verduras, él recorre los campos comprando los productos de la zona como  naranjas, mandarinas, limón, sandias, melón, etc. y luego los lleva a la ciudad de Playas para vender a comerciantes mayoristas, realiza dos o tres viajes por semana dependiendo de la producción y las ventas que deba hacer, tiene mas de 10 años dedicado a esta actividad. Ella en su casa también tiene una tienda de víveres en la cual trabaja todos los días.

Este crédito lo va a emplear en comprar frutas de todo tipo y productos de primera necesidad para surtir su tienda. Lleva más de 8 años en el Banco Comunal y le gusta por los beneficios que ha recibido de parte de la Fundación Espoir.
 
Su sueño es tener un camión para que su esposo realice sus ventas.
texts.en:
The Avance y Desarrollo Community Bank meets every two weeks in Junín canton, an area well known for its friendly and hardworking people as well as the best aguadiente (fruit-based brandy) in the province and Ecuador.

38-year old Sra. Mariana lives here. She is married and has three children aged 17, 13, and 5. The two older ones attend high school, and the youngest primary school. Her husband is a businessman.

Mariana is taking on a loan for her husband’s business. He buys and sells fruit, plantains, and vegetables. He travels into the countryside to buy oranges, mandarins, lemons, watermelon, melons etc. and then transports them to the town of Playas where he sells the produce to wholesalers. He makes this journey two or three times a week depending on production and the sales he has to make. It’s a job he’s been doing for more than ten years. 

Mariana also has a grocery store in her home where she works every day. The loan is to buy different kinds of fruit and basic supplies as stock for her store. She’s been a member of the Community Bank for eight years and enjoys it because of the benefits she’s received from Fundación Espoir. 

Mariana’s dream is to own a truck for her husband’s business.

loans.use: to buy fruit and basic supplies

loans.name: Ernestina Guadalupe

texts.es: Ernestina, está solicitando nuevamente un préstamo para la compra de 5 cerdos pequeños, ya que quiere continuar con su negocio en la granja. Ella considera que ha tenido un buen efecto el uso del préstamo anterior, porque realizo una buena compra, sus condiciones han mejorado en la familia  y se siente motivada por seguir trabajando.
texts.en: Ernestina is requesting a new loan in order to buy 5 small pigs since she wants to continue with her business on the farm. She believes that her former loan had a positive impact because she made a good buy, her family’s living conditions have improved and she feels motivated to continue working.

loans.use: to purchase 5 small pigs.

loans.name: Yin

texts.en:
Mrs. Yin is a 42-year-old married woman who has been living in Prey Chor district of Kompong Cham province, Cambodia. She is a responsible mother of 2 school-age children. Yin and her husband are in the same business, cultivating rice crop.  She has been engaged in this business since 1992, and typically generates a good income of $10.00 per day, 
At this time Yin is requesting loan from Kiva, through HKL, to pay for the mechanical repair of her family-owned motorcycle that is broken. In the future, Yin hopes that she’ll be able to provide her children a further education. She is very happy and thankful to all lenders.

loans.use: to pay for the mechanical repair of her family-owned motorcycle.

loans.name: Tuvshin

texts.en: Tuvshin is 47 years old and lives with his wife in Suhbaatar province of Mongolia.  Tuvshin's wife is a shop assistant and his son lives in the capital city.  He has been running ice-cream retails since 2003.  He started ice-cream production in 2009.  Over time, he became experienced and has become popular in the town.   With this experience, he would like to make different sorts of ice-cream by buying new equipment.  He needs some support for this and he  says ""I would like to keep this ice-cream business so that our family will have an income source."  He is requesting 400,000 MNT for the ice-cream equipment."

loans.use: To buy equipment to make different kinds of ice-cream

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy beers and sodas to sell

loans.name: Ul

texts.en:
Mrs. Ul is a 71-year-old single parent who has been living with her daughter and two nieces in the Prey Chor district of Cambodia. To earn a living, Mrs. Ul has been involved in rice husbandry since 1979. Her daughter always assists Mrs. Ul in farming in addition to her own work as a potter for a private factory in the province. 

Mrs. Ul would like to take out her first loan to replace her thatched roof, which is ruined because it has lasted a long time. In the near future, Mrs. Ul intends to raise piglets in order to increase her revenue and better her standard of living.

loans.use: to replace her thatched roof, which is ruined.

loans.name: Nida

texts.en:
Nida is 37 years old and married with two children.

Nida works hard to provide for her family. She runs a dry-goods retail business in the Philippines. She has requested a PHP 22000 loan through NWTF to buy an additional stock of dry goods to sell.

Nida has borrowed and paid 11 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the dry-goods retail business for nine years and also earns an income from a general store.

Nida aspires to repair and renovate her family home.

loans.use: To buy an additional stock of dry goods to sell.

loans.name: Hannah

texts.en: Hannah is 36 years old and married with 3 children. She sells sweaters and dresses to earn a living. She has been in the business for 6 years. Since she joined Faulu Kenya, Hannah has been able to grow her business and hopes to be financially stable in the future. She has applied for 43,000 KES to buy sweaters and dresses for sale.

loans.use: to buy sweaters and dresses for sale

loans.name: Robert Cristhian

texts.es:
Robert tiene 24 años de edad,  es conviviente y tiene 2 hijos.  Vive en casa propia, la cual está ubicada en el Caserío Juan Velasco  Alvarado,  ubicado en el distrito de Tambogrande, en la región Piura, ubicada a más de 3 horas de la ciudad de Chiclayo, capital del departamento de Lambayeque.  Robert  vive en la parte rural  de este distrito y aún no cuenta con servicios básicos en su vivienda.

Robert se dedica a la agricultura y crianza de aves de corral,  contando a la fecha con 1/2 ha de terreno agrícola que utiliza para la siembra de limón, cosechando semanalmente.  Su conviviente se dedica a la crianza de aves de corral. Ambos trabajan en unión para seguir adelante con su negocio, además existe una buena relación familiar lo que les permite seguir un objetivo juntos.

Robert desea comprar fertilizantes para el cultivo de limón y compra de alimentos balanceados para el engorde de su ganado ovino.  Esta inversión en sus negocios le permitirá seguir creciendo más y por ende lograr una mejor calidad de vida.  Es por ello que para lograr su objetivo ha creído conveniente  obtener un préstamo de 1000 nuevos soles.

Robert es un padre ejemplar, muy admirado por sus vecinos de su zona.
texts.en:
24-year old Robert is married and has two children. He lives in his own house located in the village of Juan Velasco Alvarado in Tambogrande District, Piura, more than three hours from the town of Chiclayo which is the capital of Lambayeque Department. Robert lives in the rural part of the district and does not yet have basic services in his home.

Robert is a farmer and also raises poultry. He owns 1/2 hectare of land on which he grows lemons, picking them every week. His wife looks after the poultry. They work together to make their business successful; their good relationship allows them to achieve their goals together.

Robert wishes to buy fertilizer for the lemon trees and quality feed for his sheep. With these purchases his businesses will grow and he will be able to achieve a better standard of living. For these reasons he would like to borrow S/.1,000.

He is an exemplary father, much admired by his neighbours.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer for his land and feed for his sheep

loans.name: Rosalina

texts.es:
Rosalina, está solicitando nuevamente un préstamo para la compra de materiales para cambiar el techo, su compra será de laminas nuevas, estas la instalara en el techo, para que estén más seguros, con su familia, además comprara plátanos verdes para hacer tostadas y de ser posible materiales para hacer tamales. Este nuevo préstamo espera que cubra sus expectativas para continuar mejorando.
Rosalina ha tenido un cambio en este periodo, y es que se le dio la oportunidad de adquirir un lote municipal, con facilidades de pago, en la que construye su propia casa, esto es una superación para ella y su familia.
texts.en:
Rosalina is seeking another loan this time to buy materials to repair the roof on her house. She wishes to buy new metal sheets to install on the roof so that the house is more secure for her family. She also wishes to buy green plantains to make tostadas, and if possible, ingredients for tamales. Rosalina hopes that this new loan will help her achieve her goals so that she can continue making progress.

Since her last loan Rosalina has had a change in her life. She was given the opportunity to purchase a municipal lot on credit on which to build her own house. This is an important breakthrough for Rosalina and her family.

loans.use: to buy metal sheets for the roof

loans.name: Jose Hector

texts.es:
José, solicita un nuevo préstamo para el fortalecimiento del negocio, lo invertirá en productos de la canasta básica para ofrecer a los clientes como azúcar, aceite,  jabón, detergentes, que son demandados por quienes consumen de su negocio.
Él considera que ha tenido una buena experiencia en el negocio, todo por medio de la administración de los préstamos, que también le ha permitido mejorar las condiciones de vida con su familia.
texts.en:
José is requesting a new loan to strengthen his business. He will invest it in basic supplies to offer his customers such as sugar, cooking oil, soap, detergent which are in great demand by his clientele.

He believes he has had a good experience in his business because of receiving these loans which have also enabled him to improve his family’s living conditions.

loans.use: to buy sugar, cooking oil, soap, detergent.

loans.name: Uuriintsolmon

texts.en: Uuriintsolmon is 27 years old, and lives with his wife and son in Hovd province of western Mongolia. His wife is an accountant for the private company but she is on maternity leave, taking care of the sons.  He started a car washing business and a taxi business in 2009.  With the profits, he constructed a building and sine 2010, he started running a food market.  Since his sales have grown recently, he would like to increase the variety of products at the market. He is a diligent guy who says that "I want to extend my business by trading different kinds of products to meet the family needs".  The total amount he is requesting is 3,000,000 MNT for the supplies.

loans.use: To purchase a variety of products for sale at the store.

loans.name: Oyunnomin

texts.en: Oyunnomin is 39 years old and lives with her husband and 2 daughters in Tuv province of Central Mongolia.  Her husband is unemployed but helps her with the business. The daughters study at the local schools. She has been running a meat retailing business for 7 years at the shop counter. During that period, she made many regular customers. The sales have been growing over the last 4 years. Therefore she decided to open her own meat shop and getting the supplies in large quantities. She has already prepared the shop building with her finances.  She is a clever woman who says that "I would like to extend my business activities by opening my new shop, and purchasing large quantities at discounted prices". The total amount she is requesting is 4,000,000 MNT for the meat supplies.

loans.use: To buy more meat

loans.name: Otgonsuren

texts.en: Otgonsuren is a 43 year old widowed woman who lives with her 2 daughters in Uvurhangai province of Central Mongolia. She is a professional cook and worked as the major until 2009.  Then she started her cafe business in a rental space in the market in 2011.  Since that time, she has made some changes inside the room and for the food.  Her customers are really satisfied with the service.  Now, she plans to buy some new equipment for the business, so that the food can be prepared easily and the service will be greatly improved. She is really responsible woman who says that "I wish to extend my business activity to earn more for my daughters' college tuition fees.  I have further plans, too".  She is requesting a total of 2,500,000 MNT for the cooking equipment and additional chairs and tables for her cafe.

loans.use: To purchase cooking equipment, and additional chairs & tables for her cafe

loans.name: Filomina

texts.en: Filomina owns and operates a store selling daily use products in her community. She is 63 years old, married and has six children and lives in Katipunan, Sinacaban, Misamis Occidental.   Filomina has been in her business for 5 years and earns 8,000 a month.  In 2008, Filomina joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her living conditions and enable her to engage in business activities. She is requesting a loan of 43,000 PHP which will be used to purchase additional products to sell.  She plans to use the additional revenue to improve and expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional products to sell

loans.name: Sarapio

texts.en: Sarapio is a 64-year-old married man with eight children living in Kasese, Uganda. His personal goals are educating his children and buying a car. He has been a farmer for the last two years, and his major hardship is inadequate capital to purchase stock. He has a vision of buying land to grow crops and expanding his poultry project. Sarapio needs a loan to pay school fees.

loans.use: to pay school fees

loans.name: Christine

texts.en:
Christine is 29 years old. She is married to Johnstone and has five school-going children. She has been in business for one year. She generates a monthly income of 2,500 Kenyan shillings (KES).

Christine has applied for a loan of 30,000 KES. She will be using the loan to purchase fertilizers and seeds. The anticipated profits will be used to provide for the basic needs of her family. 

This is her second loan from KADET LTD, after successfully repaying the previous loan. Her dream is to be able to educate her children and improve the standard of living in the community.

loans.use: To purchase fertilizers and seeds

loans.name: Olafeniwa Angele

texts.fr: Agée de 37 ans, Angèle est mariée et mère de  deux enfants. Elle a une boutique dans laquelle elle vend des tenues pret à porter. Elle a sollicité un financement auprès de Finadev en vue d'accroître son stock et de maximiser son profit pour le bonheur de la famille.
texts.en: At 37 years of age, Angèle is a married mother of two. She has a store where she sells ready-to-wear clothing. Angèle is requesting financing from Finadev with the aim of increasing her inventory and maximizing her profit for the sake of her family.

loans.use: to buy a dozen of ten different items

loans.name: Blanca Esperanza

texts.es:
Blanca Esperanza tiene 54 años de edad, es madre soltera con una hija de 23 años de edad, vive con ella y un nieto en el Barrio Terencio Sierra de Tela, Atlántida.

Doña Blanca, tiene 10 años de dedicarse a vender perfumes originales y ropa de acuerdo a pedidos. Ella inicio este negocio por la necesidad de obtener ingresos para que su hija estudiara y decidió invertir con ahorros que le dejo su ex esposo. Su venta es a domicilio y de acuerdo a pedidos.
Ha mantenido un nivel de inventario reinvirtiendo las ganancias y mas la ayuda de préstamos, esto le ha permitido mejorar los ingresos y mejorar el negocio ya que ahora tiene más clientes.
Actualmente está solicitando el doceavo préstamo para seguir invirtiendo del cual va comprar perfumes y ropa que le han pedido y aumentar sus ganancias.
La meta personal es tener su propia casa y conseguir un local comercial en una zona estratégica de la ciudad para poner el negocio y vender más.
texts.en:
Blanca Esperanza is 54 years old.  She is a single mother with a 23-year-old daughter, and she lives with her and a grandchild in the Terencio Sierra neighborhood of Tela in Atlántida.

Doña Blanca has been working for the last 10 years selling genuine perfumes and clothing in response to orders.  She began this business out of the necessity of earning income so that her daughter could attend school, and she decided to invest in it with the savings that were left to her by her ex-husband.  She sells from home in response to orders.

She has kept up a level of inventory by reinvesting her earnings and also with the help of loans.  This has allowed her to improve her income and improve her business, as she now has more customers.

She is currently requesting her tenth loan so she can continue investing.  She will purchase perfumes and clothing for which she has orders, and will increase her earnings.

Her personal goal is to have her own home and to take on commercial premises in a strategic part of the city for her business so that she can sell more.

loans.use: to stock up on perfume and clothing products for sale.

loans.name: Remigio

texts.es:
El señor  Remigio, tiene 57 años, esta casado, tiene 5 hijos 2 mujeres y 3 varones de las edades de 28, 26, 24, 23 y 18 años. 
Todos sus hijos ya están casados, él junto a su esposa residen en la comunidad del Campanario, Municipio de Santa Cruz de Yojoa. 
Don Remigio desde que era un niño se ha dedicada a la agricultura, es por eso que siempre le ha gustado trabajar en sus cultivos (maíz y café) para obtener sus propias ganancias.
Ha solicitado un crédito por la cantidad de 8,000 Lempiras, los que piensa invertir en la compra de fertilizantes para abonar los cultivos de maíz y café.
Don Remigio esta muy satisfecho con la actividad que desarrollo, él espera dejar un buen patrimonio a sus hijos para que ellos sigan trabajando en los cultivos
texts.en:
Señor  Remigio is 57 years old.  He is married with five children: two daughters and three sons, aged 28, 26, 24, 23 and 18.  His children are all married already.    He lives with his wife in the community of Campanario, in the municipality of Santa Cruz de Yojoa.
 
Ever since he was a child, Don Remigio has worked in agriculture.  This is why he has always enjoyed working with his crops (corn and coffee) to earn his own income.

He has requested a loan for the sum of 8,000 lempiras, which he is planning to invest in the purchase of fertilizers to nourish the corn and coffee crops.

Don Remigio is very satisfied with the way his work has been going.  He hopes to leave a good inheritance for his children so that they can continue working with the crops.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers.

loans.name: Eva

texts.es:
Eva, solicita nuevamente un préstamo para la compra de artículos de primera necesidad, para resurtir la tienda con productos como aceite, huevos, pan, galletas, pastas, frijoles, y otros productos que se necesitan para atender la demanda de los clientes.
Ella considera que su negocio ha mejorado con la utilidad que ha tenido del préstamo, mejorando sus ventas e incrementando las ganancias.
texts.en:
Eva is now applying for a loan to purchase basic food items to restock her store with products such as oil, eggs, bread, crackers, pastas, beans, and other items that are needed to fill the requests of her customers.

She feels that her business has improved with the use of the (previous) loan, improving her sales and increasing her earnings.

loans.use: to buy oil, eggs, bread, crackers, pasta, and beans

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy products for her store

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase school shoes.

loans.name: Fanis Maritza

texts.es:
Fany, se ha decido por seguir trabajando con préstamos, por eso está solicitando para la compra de materiales agrícolas, pues se dispone a sembrar pipián, los insumos que comprara son herbicidas, abono y tambien pagara mano de obra para realizar el arado. 
Ella considera que el trabajo con la ayuda de los prestamos se hace más fácil, ha ayudado a su esposo a realizar las siembra y los resultados en las cosechas han sido mejor.
texts.en:
Fany has decided to continue working with loans, so she is applying to buy agricultural materials, since she is getting ready to plant squash. The supplies that she will buy are herbicides and compost, and she will also pay for labor to do the plowing.

She feels that work becomes easier with the help of the loans, it has helped her husband to do the planting, and the results in the harvests have been better.

loans.use: to buy herbicides and compost and also pay for labor

loans.name: Maria Susana

texts.es:
María, solicita un nuevo préstamo para ampliar más el inventario del negocio, comprara mariscos como por ejemplo, pescado de varias clases, camarones de varias clases, ostras, calamar, y otras especies que son de la preferencia de muchos clientes.
Para María el negocio ha mejorado después de hacer uso de créditos, ya que ha tenido la facilidad económica para poder realizar inversiones y mejorar con el negocio.
texts.en: Maria is requesting a new loan to further expand her business inventory.  She will buy seafood, for example: a variety of fish, a variety of shrimp, oysters, squid and other seafood according to the preferences of her customers.   For Maria, the business has improved since she has been taking loans, because she has had the financial means to make investments to improve the business.

loans.use: to buy a variety of types of fish, shrimp, oysters, and squid

loans.name: Apolinaria

texts.en:
Apolinaria is a married woman from Trinidad, Bohol.  She and her husband are both farmers.  Apolinaria helps till their land and plant rice crops on it.  She also helps pull weeds out.  Apolinaria said she wakes up early in the morning to prepare food for her family and then help her husband work on their farm. Apolinaria works hard to support her family.

Apolinaria has requested this loan to purchase fertilizers and to pay for labor.  She hopes for this loan to help increase their harvest.  In the future, Apolinaria hopes for her family to experience a better quality of living.

loans.use: To purchase fertilizers and pay for labor.

loans.name: Jemimah

texts.en:
Jemimah is 49 years of age and supports a family of five.  She is married to Johnstone who also produces additional income for the family.

She has been in this business for one year and generates a monthly income of KES 5,000.  She will be using the loan to purchase more stocks of clothing to sell to customers and the anticipated profits will be used to support members of the family.

This is her second loan with KADET LTD after successfully repaying the first.  Her hopes and dream is to see her business expand more and more.

loans.use: To buy more stock of clothing to sell to customers.

loans.name: Stephen

texts.en: Stephen is 45 years old, married with four children.  He does maize and vegetable farming to earn a living.  He has been in the business for 20 years and has employed three people.  Since he joined Faulu Kenya, he has been able to save his income and hopes to expand his business in the future.  He has applied for 30,000 Kenya Shillings to buy maize seeds and fertilizer.

loans.use: To buy  maize seeds and fertilizer.

loans.name: Stephen

texts.en:
Stephen is a 32 year old matatu operator in Mshomoroni, Mombasa.  He is single.  His business has been in operation for the past seven years.  It is doing great. 

This marks his first business loan from KADET LTD to finance his business.  With the loan, he plans to repair his matatu.  He will use the anticipated profits to repay his loan and purchase a motorcycle to begin a boda boda business. 

He hopes to have a successful business.

loans.use: To repair his matatu.

loans.name: Oscar Javier

texts.es:
Oscar Javier, de 41 años de edad, es padre soltero de un hijo de 12 años de edad, con quien vive en la aldea Brisas de Cuyamapa, de Victoria, Yoro.

Oscar en busca de una fuente de ingresos con que vivir, hace tres años decidió invertir y establecer una pulpería para vender productos alimenticios como granos básicos, azúcar, golosinas, refrescos, condimentos etc. este lo inicio con sus propios esfuerzos y a surtido poco a poco. A este negocio le dedica tiempo completo con la ayuda de su hijo. 
Siempre ha trabajado de jornalero y tiene una yunta de bueyes, los que trabaja preparando tierras para cultivos, de allí el recibe otros ingresos. 
Solicita este préstamo para surtir la pulpería de productos de la canasta básica como azúcar, granos básicos, embutidos, churros, refrescos etc. para continuar vendiendo y con las ganancias espera darle una preparación académica a su hijo.
texts.en:
Oscar Javier, aged 41, is a single father to a 12-year-old son with whom he lives in the Brisas de Cuyamapa village in Victoria, in Yoro.

While searching for a means of income with which to live, Oscar decided three years ago to invest in and establish a convenience store to sell food products such as basic grains, sugar, candy, sodas, spices, etc.  He began it with his own efforts and bit by bit has stocked it up.  He works full time in this business with the help of his son.

He has always worked as a day-laborer, and has a yoke of oxen which he uses to prepare fields for planting and from which he receives additional income.

He is requesting this loan to stock up his convenience store with basic everyday products such as sugar, basic grains, canned goods, fritters, sodas, etc., so that he can continue selling.  With his earnings, he hopes to provide his son with an academic foundation.

loans.use: to stock up his business with products such as basic grains, sugar, fritters, spices, sodas, and canned goods.

loans.name: Selvin Adrian

texts.es:
Selvin Adrian, tiene 25 años de edad, soltero, vive en la aldea Guangolola del Negrito, Yoro junto con sus padres y hermanos.

Selvin siempre se ha dedicado realizar trabajos de agricultura  junto a su padre y hace 2 años que realiza sus propios cultivos, el tiene tres manzanas de terreno donde cultiva maíz, frijoles y arroz, esta producción es de primera calidad. le dedica 7 horas diarias. Sus padres le apoyan mucho ya que es una persona muy responsable.
Esta solicitando su primer préstamo con ODEF, de 13,000.00 Lempiras a un plazo corto para comprar fertilizantes e insumos y pago de mano de obra para el cultivar  maíz.
El espera ampliar el área de cultivo, para obtener ingresos y mejorar el nivel de vida familiar, tanto económico como para comprar algunas cosas materiales que necesitan.
texts.en:
Selvin Adrian is 25 years old.  He lives in the village of Guangolola in Negrito in Yoro with his parents and siblings.

Selvin has always worked in agriculture alongside his father, and for the last two years he has been growing his own crops.  He has three fields where he grows corn, beans and rice, with top-quality products.  He works seven hours a day.  His parents help him out greatly, as he is a very responsible person.

He is requesting his first loan from ODEF for 13,000 lempiras for the short-term to purchase fertilizers and supplies, and to pay for labor to grow the corn.

He hopes to expand his farmland to obtain more income and improve his family's quality of life financially, such as by purchasing some material things they need.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers and supplies for growing corn.

loans.name: Maria Higinia

texts.es:
María, vive con su esposo y tres hijos de 18, 27 y 28 años de edad, ella se dedica a la venta de tortillas y tamales, la venta la atiende por las mañanas y por las tardes vende tamales.
Actualmente solicita un préstamo para la compra de quintales de maíz, para la elaboracion de tamales y tortillas, ya que este producto sirve para las dos actividades, este préstamo le ayudara para aumentar la producción y atender más eficiente el trabajo.
La aspiración de María es en un futuro, con mucho esfuerzo poderse comprar una casa para vivir con su familia.
texts.en:
María lives with her husband and three children, ages 18, 27, and 28.  She earns her living selling tortillas in the morning and tamales in the afternoon.

She is currently seeking a loan to buy corn in bulk by the kilo. She can use the corn to make both tortillas and tamales.  The loan will help her increase production and work more efficiently.

María's aspiration for the future is to work very hard to be able to buy a house to live in with her family.

loans.use: to buy corn to make tortillas and tamales.

loans.name: Josue Abacu

texts.es:
Josué, reside con su familia, sus padres, un sobrino, él se dedica a la panadería, este oficio lo aprendió recibiendo clases de panificación, lo realiza desde hace mucho tiempo.
Él solicita un préstamo para la compra de materia prima para la elaboración de pan: harina, levadura, azúcar, manteca, para que con estos materiales surta el negocio y pueda aumentar la producción.
La aspiración de Josué es crecer con el negocio, con la ayuda de estos préstamos.
texts.en:
Josué lives with his family, his parents, and a nephew. He works as a baker, a trade that he learned by taking classes in bread-making a long time ago.

He is applying for a loan to purchase basic ingredients for making bread: flour, leavening, sugar, and lard, so that with these ingredients he can stock his business and increase his production.

Josué's goal is to increase his business with the help of these loans.

loans.use: to buy flour, leavening, sugar, and lard

loans.name: Gorretti

texts.en:
Goretti is a thirty eight year old hardworking lady with two children living in Kasese,Uganda.  Her personal goals are educating her children, self education and buying a car.

She has been in the cosmetics business for the last two years, after starting with capital of four hundred thousand and her business is now worth two million shillings.  Her major hardships are price fluctuations and inadequate capital to purchase stock, however, she has a vision of expanding her business to new areas, hiring employees to help expand her business and moving her business to a more permanent location.  Goretti needs a loan to buy cosmetics yo sell.

loans.use: To buy cosmetics to sell.

loans.name: Mary

texts.en:
Mary is a 40-year-old business lady. She is married to Charles, a businessman. They are blessed with two children. She has been running a cyber café for the past seven years with a monthly income of KES 15,000, which she uses to support her family.

She is applying for her first loan term with KADET, after being introduced by an existing KADET customer. Mary will use the loan to buy new computers.
 
With the anticipated profit from the business, she will educate her children. Her hopes and dreams are to open different cyber café branches in her area.

loans.use: to buy new computers.

loans.name: Mirian Ondina

texts.es:
Miriam Ondina tiene 34 años de edad, es madre soltera, y tiene 3 hijos de 16,14 y 10 años de edad, vive con ellos en la Aldea Cedros, Tela, Atlántida.
Miriam  tiene 6 meses de dedicarse a  la venta de ropa nueva y calzado, vende ropa de dama, caballeros y niños. Anteriormente ella vendía comida solo los fines de semana pero vio que no le era rentable para la manutención de sus hijos. Eso le motivo a establecer su propio negocio en el cual le ha ayudado a obtener los ingresos necesarios y que pos sus propios esfuerzos ha logrado mantenerlo, dedicándole 5 horas diarias.
Actualmente solicita su primer préstamo de 5,000 lempiras el cual lo invertirá en compra de útiles escolares para la venta y aprovechar la temporada escolar y así poder obtener un ingreso más a su hogar.
Su plan es seguir trabajando para hacer crecer su negocio y si poder darles un mejor futuro a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Miriam Ondina is 34 years old.  She is a single mother with three children aged 16, 14 and 10.  She lives with them in the village of Cedros, in Tela in Atlántida.

For the last six months, Miriam has been working selling new clothing and shoes.  She sells clothes for women, men and children.  Previously she sold food only on the weekends, but she saw that this wasn't profitable for supporting her children.  This motivated her to set up her own business which has helped her to earn the income she needs.  Through her own efforts she has been able to keep it going, working for five hours daily.

She is currently requesting her first loan for 5,000 lempiras, which she will invest in the purchase of school supplies for sale so she can take advantage of the school season and so be able to earn additional income for her household.

Her plan is to continue working to be able to grow her business, and so to be able to provide a better future for her children.

loans.use: to purchase school supplies.

loans.name: Aura Lillian

texts.es: La señora Aura, es comerciante, vende leña y tiste (una bebida típica hecha a base de maíz, azúcar, cacao, canela ) , casada, madre de 2 hijos los cuales están estudiando en la universidad. Empezó con este negocio a los 40 años de edad, vendiendo tiste y hielo con el tiempo fue incorporando la venta de leña, ella vende en su casa de habitación en la ciudad de León. Solicita el crédito para compra de cacao, maíz, leña. Ya es que un inventario que necesita tener para poder vender y mejorar sus ingresos. Siempre con el objetivo de apoyar a sus hijos para que finalicen sus carreras universitarias
texts.en: Aura is a businesswoman who sells firewood and tiste (a typical corn-based drink with sugar cacao, and cinnamon).  She's married with two children in college.  She started her business when she was forty-years-old, selling tiste and ice.  In time she added firewood.  She sells from her house where she lives in the city of León.  She is seeking a loan to buy cacao, corn, and firewood, the inventory she needs to sell so she can increase her income.  She is always out to support her children so they can complete their university degrees.

loans.use: to buy cacao, corn, and firewood.

loans.name: Belkin Yojana

texts.es:
Belkin Yojana, tiene 27 años de edad, tiene un hijo de 4 años de edad, es madre soltera y vive en la Colonia Valle fresco de Olanchito.

Debido a la falta de empleo, ella decidió dedicarse a vender comida, ya tiene tres años de realizar esta actividad. Consiguió un local frente a la terminal de buses de la cuidad, dicho negocio era de su madre quien se lo heredo y ofrece comida rápida como ser: baleadas, tacos, pastelitos con carne, tajadas con carne y pollo, refrescos etc. tiene buena clientela abre el negocio desde las seis de la mañana hasta las cuatro de la tarde.
El préstamo que ha solicitado es para invertir en compra de insumos como carnes, verduras, harinas, manteca, condimentos etc.  Para la elaboración de comidas y también hará reparaciones al local para ofrecer un buen servicio al cliente.
Todo este esfuerzo que está haciendo es para superarse económicamente con su familia y hacer crecer el negocio.
texts.en:
Belkin Yojana, aged 27, has a four-year-old child.  She is a single mother and lives in the Valle Fresco village in Olanchito.

Owing to lack of employment, she decided to work selling food, which she has been doing for three years now.  She has premises across from the city bus-terminal.  This business was her mother's, from whom she inherited it.  She sells fast food such as baleadas (filled tortillas), tacos, pastries stuffed with meat, fried plantains with meat and chicken, sodas, etc.  She has a good customer base. and her business is open from six in the morning until four in the afternoon.

The loan that she has requested is for investing in the purchase of ingredients such as meat, vegetables, flour, butter, spices, etc., for making food.  It is also for making repairs to her premises so as to be able to offer good service to her customers.

All this effort that she is making is to be able to get ahead financially with her family, and to be able to grow her business.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for making food and to repair her business premises.

loans.name: Sabohat

texts.ru: Сабохат более 10 лет занимается растениеводством. Ей 27 лет. Она в основном занимается выращиванием бахчевых культур. Сабохат замужем. У нее двое детей. Ее муж работает в дехканском хозяйстве. Она берет кредит для закупа минеральных удобрений.
texts.en:
Sabohat has been engaged in crop production for more than 10 years. She is 27 years old. She primarily works with growing melons. 

Sabohat is married. She has two children. Her husband works at a dehkan farm (midsized peasant farm, legally and physically distinct from household plots). 

Sabohat takes a loan for the purchase of fertilizer.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer

loans.name: Maricela De Los Angeles

texts.es:
Marisela, una joven de 20  años de edad, sencilla habitante de los Ranchos una comunidad  pobre  de León, donde la mayoría de sus vecinos al igual que ella viven en casas muy humildes de lata, plástico y cartón , pero aun en medio de su pobreza tiene un espíritu de superación y unas ganas incansables por salir adelante. Ella es madre de un niño de 1 año  de edad, se dedica a la crianza de  cerdos desde hace dos años, este ha sido su primer negocio el cual le enseñaron sus padres que se dedicaban a lo mismo. 
Ella solicita el crédito para compra de cerdos, pues es un negocio que genera buenos ingresos y que le ayudan a su familia para salir adelante. Su expectativa es lograr tener una granja de cerdos reproductores y mejorar las condiciones de crianza de sus animales. Pues desea ahorrar para ir reparando su vivienda poco a poco.
texts.en:
Maricela, a young woman of 20, is an uncomplicated inhabitant of Los Ranchos, a poor community of León, where the majority of her neighbors, like herself, live in very humble houses of tin, plastic, and cardboard, but even in the midst of her poverty, she has the spirit to excel and an untiring will to advance. She is the mother of a one-year-old son. For two years her work has been raising pigs. This has been her first business, which her parents taught her, since they did the same work.

She is applying for the loan to buy pigs, since this is a business that generates good income and which helps her family advance. Her goal is to be able to have a reproductive pig farm and to improve the conditions for raising her animals,. She wants to save to gradually repair her house, little by little.

loans.use: to buy pigs

loans.name: Norma Lisset

texts.es:
La señora Norma Lisset tiene 46 años de edad, es madre soltera, tiene 3 hijos de 13, 15, y 19 años de edad de los cuales solo 2 están estudiando, vive en el Km 17 Arizona, Atlántida.
Su actividad económica es un negocio de pulpería que estableció hace un año por medio de su cuñada, la cual le facilito los medios de obtenerlo. Ella vende granos básicos, lácteos, carnes, embutidos. Con este negocio ha podido solventar las necesidades básicas de sus hijos y en su hogar, dedicando todo el día a su negocio.
Ella solicita su primer préstamo con ODEF, el cual le ayudara a surtir más de producto como harina, frijoles, arroz, azúcar, manteca etc.,  y adicionalmente comprara artículos escolares, aprovechando la temporada escolar, para obtener mayores ganancias.
Con la inversión a su negocio es hacerlo crecer en clientes y así obtener la fuente económica para la sostenibilidad de su familia.
texts.en:
Señora Norma Lisset is 46 years old.  She is a single mother with three children aged 13, 15 and 19, two of whom are in school.  She lives in Km 17 in Arizona, in Atlántida.

Her economic activity is a convenience store business which she established a year ago with the help of her sister-in-law, who made available the means to get it.  She sells basic grains, dairy products, meat, and sausages.  With this business she has been able to cover basic necessities for her children and her household.  She works all day at the business.

She is requesting her first loan through ODEF, which will help her to stock up further with products such as flour, beans, rice, sugar, butter, etc.  She will also purchase school supplies, taking advantage of the school season to get more earnings.

The investment in her business is to increase her customers and so obtains a source of income for the support of her family.

loans.use: to purchase flour, beans, butter, rice, sugar, etc and school supplies.

loans.name: Gabriel Arcanjel

texts.es:
El señor Gabriel,   51 años de edad, vive en la comarca Corazón de Jesús ubicada en  las afuera de León, tiene 7 hijos, se dedica a la siembra de hortalizas. Inicio junto con un amigo a sembrar poco a poco fue adquiriendo experiencia hasta lograr independizarse y sembrar por su propia cuenta comprando herramientas para sembrar cuando la venta de hortalizas en baja en el mercado local, el se dedica a vender huevo y leche para cubrir los gastos y priorizar el alimento d su familia.  Uno de sus planes es ampliar el área de siembra para cultivar variedad de frutas. 
Realizo el crédito para compra de insumos, gasolina para el motor de riego, pago de mano de obra para siembra de yuca, ajonjolí, maíz, pipián. Espera sea una cosecha que le de muy buena calidad y buen rendimiento.
texts.en:
Señor Gabriel is 51 years old.  He lives in the Corazón de Jesús area, which is located on the outskirts of León.  He has seven children, and works growing vegetables.  He started farming with a friend, and bit by bit he was able to gain experience until he was able to start working for himself and farm on his own account, and purchased farming tools.  When vegetable sales at the local market are low, he works selling eggs and milk to cover expenses and to prioritize feeding his family.  

One of his plans is to expand his farming area to grow a variety of fruits.

He is taking out the loan to purchase supplies and fuel for his irrigation motor, and to pay for labor to plant yucca, sesame, corn, and squash.  He hopes this harvest will provide good quality and good yield.

loans.use: to purchase supplies and fuel for his irrigation motor, and to pay for labor for planting yucca, sesame, corn and squash.

loans.name: Ergashoi

texts.ru: Эргашой замужем и любящая мать троих детей. Муж является дехканином. Более 5 лет она занимается выращиванием сельхозпродукции также ячменя. Кроме того она занимается откормом скота. Данное время она имеет 2 голов крупного и 4 голов мелкого рогатого скота. Эргашой хотела бы получить займ в размере 7000 Сомони для покупки трех голов крупного рогатого скота. Она надеется на вашу помощь и поддержку.
texts.en:
Ergashoi is married and the loving mother of three children. Her husband is a farmer. Ergashoi has worked with growing agricultural products and barley for more than five years. In addition to this she works with fattening cattle. 

She currently owns two heads of cattle and four heads of sheep and goats. Egrashoi would like to receive a loan in the amount of 7,000 somoni for the purchase of three heads of cattle. She hopes for your help and support.

loans.use: to purchase cattle

loans.name: Maritza Apolinar

texts.es:
Martiza, una comerciante de 52 años de edad , madre soltera, tiene un hijo mayor  de edad, independiente, ella vende mariscos en Salinas Grandes comarca cercana a las zonas costeras de León. Ella comenzó a trabajar a los 18 años de edad junto con su madre se dedicaba a la crianza de cerdo pero al  pasar el tiempo de independizo y puso su propio negocio una pulpería y venta de mariscos negocio que le permitió criar a su hijo y pagar los gastos de su hogar. 
Realizo el crédito para comprar y  abastecer su pulpería de productos tales como detergentes, jabones, enlatados , granos básicos , huevo, leche, jugos. La meta de ella es tener bien abastecida su pulpería para que sus clientes encuentren de todo y carezcan de productos.
texts.en:
Martiza is a 52-year-old business woman.  She is a single mother with a grown son who is financially independent.  She sells shellfish in the Salinas Grandes district near to the coastal areas of León. 

She began working at 18 years old alongside her mother, who worked raising pigs.  However, over time she started working for herself and started her own business of a convenience store and a business selling shellfish, which allowed her to raise her son and pay for the household expenses.

She is taking out the loan to purchase and stock up her convenience store with products such as detergents, soap, canned food, basic grains, eggs, milk, and juice.

Her goal is to have her convenience store well-stocked so that her customers can find everything they need with no products lacking.

loans.use: to purchase and stock up her convenience store with products such as detergents, soap, canned goods, basic grains, eggs, milk and juice,.

loans.name: Murdali

texts.ru: Муродали очень трудолюбивый и добрый человек. Он женат и имеет троих детей. Последние годы он начал заниматься выращиванием сельхозпродукции и откормом скота. За займом в «ИМОН Интернешнл» обращается во второй раз, так как от первого займа получил хороший доход и теперь хочет расширить свой бизнес. От полученного дохода хочет создать хорошие условия для учебы своих детей. Муродали запрашивает займ для покупки семян и скота.
texts.en: Murdali is a very kind and hard-working man. He is married and has three children. During the past few years, he has been engaged in growing crops and raising cattle. This is the second time he is turning to IMON International for a loan, as he received a good profit after the first loan, and now would like to expand his business. He would like to use his future profits to give good education to his children. Murdali is requesting this loan to purchase seeds and livestock.

loans.use: to buy seeds and livestock

loans.name: Mirzo

texts.ru: Мирзо трудолюбивый и добросовестный человек. Он очень старательный человек. Последние 10 лет он занимается выращиванием ячменя. Он также занимается скотоводством. В данное время имеет один  крупный рогатый скот и 15 голов мелкого рогатого скота. Он один работает и в семье и обеспечивает их. Мирзо хочет расширить вой бизнес и с этой целью запрашивает займ для покупки скота. За полученную прибыль хочет провести хатнатуйи своего сына.
texts.en: Mirzo is a hard-working, industrious and honest person. He has been cultivating barley for the past 10 years. He also raises livestock and currently has one cow and 15 smaller animals. He is the only breadwinner in his family. Mirzo would like to expand his business, and with this in mind he is requesting a loan to purchase more livestock. He wants to use the profits from this loan to hold a hatnatuyi (circumcision ceremony) for his son.

loans.use: to buy livestock

loans.name: Riski

texts.ru: Риски замужем и любящая мать пятерых детей. Более 17 лет она занимается выращиванием сельхозпродукции. Также она занимается скотоводством. Муж помогает жене по бизнесу. Риски запрашивает займ для покупки семян ячменя и пшеницы для посева. А также 2 голов крупного и 3 голов мелкого рогатого скота. На полученный доход от займ хочет благоустроить свой дом. Она надеется на вашу помощь и доброту.
texts.en: Riski is married and a loving mother of five children. She has been cultivating crops for over 17 years, and also raises livestock. Riski's husband helps her with the business. Riski is requesting a loan to purchase barley and wheat seeds for sowing, as well as two cows and three smaller animals. She would like to use the profits from this loan to improve her home. Riski is looking forward to your help and kindness.

loans.use: to buy seeds and livestock

loans.name: Rita Maria

texts.es:
Rita, vive en la comunidad La Ceiba , León, casada, tiene un hijo de dos años de edad, ella es ama de casa y comerciante, se dedica a la venta y crianza de cerdo. Actividad que anteriormente solo le hacían los hombres en el campo pero que ahora se ha vuelto muy popular entre las mujeres del área rural. La familia de su esposo la motivo a que ella ganara su propio dinero dedicándose a criar animales de granja tomo la iniciativa. Ya tiene dos años con esta actividad. Ella viaja hasta el mercado municipal para vender y comprar comida para alimentar a sus animales. 
Realizo el crédito para  compra de cerdos reproductores. Pues le gustaría tener una granja de cerdos reproductores y ampliar su negocio para contratar a las mujeres del campo a que tengan sus propios ingresos así como ella lo ha venido haciendo.
texts.en:
Rita lives in the La Ceiba community of Leon. She is married and has a two-year-old son. She is a housewife and merchant who devotes herself to raising and selling pigs. Previously this type of activity was done out in the country only by men, but it has become very popular now among women from rural areas. Her husband's family prompted her to earn her own income by raising farm animals and she took the initiative to do it. She has been in this business now for two years. She travels to the municipal market for selling and to buy food for feeding her animals. 

She took out the loan in order to purchase pigs for breeding. She would like to have a pig farm and expand her business in order to hire women from the countryside so they may have their own income, just as she has been doing herself.

loans.use: to purchase pigs for breeding.

loans.name: Aristedes

texts.en:
Aristedes is a farmer working in Trinidad, Bohol. She is married and has children. Her husband is also a farmer.

Aristedes works with her husband tilling their land and planting rice crops. She also grows vegetables. They sell their harvest at their town's market. Aristedes works hard to improve their family income. She asked for a loan to purchase fertilizer and other farm inputs.

In the future, Aristedes hopes for her family's living conditions to improve.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer and other farm inputs

loans.name: Mavlonkul

texts.ru: Мавлонкул женат и любящий отец четверых детей. Более 20 лет он занимается выращиванием сельхозпродукции, а также ячменя. Кроме этого он занимается откормом скота. Мавлонкул очень трудолюбивый и целеустремленный человек. Его жена тоже очень добрая женщина, она помогает мужу в домохозяйстве. В бизнесе помогают сын и невестка. Мавлонкул хотел бы получить займ в размере 5000 Сомони для покупки крупного и мелкого рогатого скота. Таким образом, он хочет расширить свой бизнес.
texts.en: Mavlonkul is married and is a loving father of four children.  He has been involved in growing agricultural crops and barley for over 20 years.  Besides this, he is involved in fattening up livestock.  Mavlonkul is a very hardworking and goal-oriented person.  His wife is also a very kind woman, who helps her husband with the household.  His son and daughter-in-law help him with the business.  Mavlonkul wants to obtain a loan in the sum of 5000 Somoni to purchase cattle and small livestock.  This is how he wants to expand his business.

loans.use: to buy cattle and small livestock

loans.name: Agnes

texts.en: Agnes is 58 years old and married with one child. She sells books to earn a living. She has been in the business for 15 years and has employed two people. Since she joined Faulu Kenya, she has been able to expand her business and hopes to be financially stable in the future. She has applied for 20,000 Kenyan shillings (KES) to buy exercise books to sell.

loans.use: To buy exercise books to sell

loans.name: David

texts.en:
David has been operating a retail shop in Kapsabet for the last six years and earns a monthly profit of KES. 17,000. He is married to Winfrida, and they have three children.

He was introduced to KADET LTD by a friend and he has applied for his first loan of  KES.20, 000 from them. He plans to use the loan to buy maize flour, wheat flour, rice, and soft drinks for sale.

The anticipated profits he will save and, in future, he hopes to expand and grow the business and open a big wholesale shop.

loans.use: to buy maize flour, wheat flour, rice, and soft drinks for sale.

loans.name: Nilda

texts.en:
Nilda is married with 3 children, one of them in school. She is 50 years old and a very hard-working entrepreneur. 

Nilda has a jeepney transport business in the Philippines. She has requested a PHP 12000 loan amount through NWTF to buy tools and equipment for her jeepney transportation.

Nilda has been in this business for 5 years. In the future, she would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy tools and equipment for her jeepney transportation business.

loans.name: Julio Cesar

texts.es: El señor. Julio se dedica a comercializar la  venta de  pan de manera ambulante, tiene un pequeño puesto de venta de gas  desde hace más de 10 años, además se dedica alquilar sillas para eventos. Es originario del viejo chinandega tiene un hijo el cual esta estudiando secundaria. Solicita el crédito para comprar una moto triciclo para comercializar su producto en zonas rurales y urbanas. Pues desea expandirse mas y mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia.
texts.en: Julio is a mobile bread vendor, and for more than ten years he has had a little stand where he sells gas tanks.  He also rents out chairs for events.  He is a native of Chinandego and he has one child in high school.  He is seeking a loan to buy a three-wheeled motor cart so he can sell his product in rural and urban areas.  He wants to expand and to improve his family's quality of life.

loans.use: to buy a three-wheeled motor cart.

loans.name: Maura Gudelia

texts.es:
La Señora. Maura es socia del banco comunal Damas Responsables, vive en la ciudad de Cuenca, ciudad que es reconocida como la "Atenas del Ecuador", es la ciudad cultural del país. Su bello paisaje urbanístico mantiene armonía con el entorno geográfico. Su centro histórico es el más grande y el mejor conservado del país,  guarda encantadoramente las claves del pasado, allí se mezclan la gente, las flores, las artesanías: tejidos, bordados, cerámica, orfebrería, platería y sombreros de paja toquilla.
 
La Señora. Maura tiene 38 años, es casada y en su unión conyugal ha concebido 2 hijos  de18 y 17 años de edad que están estudiando en la universidad. Su esposo es de profesión chofer y labora prestando sus servicios en un taxi propio, la casa en la que vive es de su propiedad.

Doña Maura es empleada privada y labora de domingo a domingo todo el día, en sus tiempos libres  vende cosméticos de diferentes marcas, esta actividad la desempeña hace un año.
 
Es socia del banco comunal hace 5 años y su nuevo crédito lo va a invertir comprando cosméticos para ampliar su negocio. 

Su meta es  crecer más en su negocio.
texts.en:
Ms. Maura is a member of the communal bank "Damas Responsables" [Responsible Ladies] and lives in the city of Cuenca, known as "the Athens of Ecuador," being the cultural city of Ecuador. Its beautiful urban landscape maintains harmony with the geographic surroundings. Its historic downtown is the largest and best preserved of the country, where keys to the past are enchantingly kept, and where the people are interspersed with flowers and handicrafts: weavings, embroidery, pottery, goldwork, silverwork and Panama hats. 

Ms. Maura is 38 years old, married, and from her conyugal bond has conceived two children, 18 and 17, who study at the university. Her husband is a professional driver and provides his services with his own taxi. The house where they live is their own property. 

Doña Maura is a private employee and works Sunday to Sunday all day. In her free time she sells cosmetics of various brands, a business she has had for one year. 

She has been a member of the communal bank for five years and her new loan will be invested in the purchase of cosmetics for expanding her business. Her goal is to further grow her business.

loans.use: to purchase cosmetics.

loans.name: Maria Fe

texts.en:
Maria Fe is from Panduma, Tukuran, Zamboanga del Sur. She is 27 years old and married with three children. 

To make a living, Maria Fe is running a general store, selling a variety of food and home-use products in the local community. Maria Fe has been in her business for 5 years and earns 1,000 PHP a month.

Maria Fe is requesting a loan of 2,600 PHP to purchase new items to expand her product offering. In 2010, Maria Fe joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her business and living situation. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the loan to save as a reserve for future emergencies.

loans.use: to purchase new items to expand her product offering

loans.name: Dominic

texts.en: Dominic is 41 years old and married with 4 children. He builds houses to earn a living. He has been in the business for 15 years and describes his business environment as good because there is limited competition. Since he joined Faulu Kenya, he has been able to improve his living standards and hopes to be financially stable in the future. He has applied for 40,000 Kenya Shillings to buy cement and building blocks.

loans.use: To buy  cement  and building bricks

loans.name: Bayarsaikhan

texts.en: Mrs. Bayarsaikhan, 52 runs a grocery store at her home. She lives with her husband and her 3 kids in an old house in the slum district of Ulaanbaatar, the capital of Mongolia. She has been running her store successfully since 2008. Now she needs to increase the income from her business because the rental fee of her store/house was increased notably in the last month. Therefore she decided to increase her working capital to purchase groceries to expand her sales volume. She has a plan to open a second branch of her grocery store.

loans.use: To purchase groceries to expand her sales volume.

loans.name: Tacianita

texts.en: This time, Tacianita is borrowing PHP 20,000 to buy more fish to sell in her food stall. The fish-vending business that she previously funded through NWTF and Kiva continues to provide her family with income that is improving their quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase more fish to sell in her stall

loans.name: Altangerel

texts.en:
Mrs. Altangerel, 40, runs a retail stall by rent in the bazaar of Darkhan, the second largest city in Mongolia. Actually, she sells some kinds of clothes, such as underwear. She has been running her business since 2009. 

Currently her business is being run successfully and already has had many customers, but the working capital size is not big enough for her planned sales volume. Therefore, she wants to increase the working capital of her business. The loan she is requesting will be used to purchase some clothes for her sales business.

loans.use: To purchase some clothes for her sales business.

loans.name: Kulmira

texts.ru: Кульмире 52 года, замужем и имеет троих детей. В 2002 году, в поисках средств к существованию для своей семьи, Кульмира начала свой бизнес в перепродаже сельхоз продукции. Кульмира использовала стартовую сумму в 5,000 сом (KGS) на первый закуп картофеля для перепродажи, и сумела развить свой бизнес  с оборотным капиталом в сумме 30,000 сом (KGS).Доходы от деятельности позволили Кульмире приобрести машину УАЗ для перевозки картофеля.  В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Кульмира обратилась в компанию «Бай – Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме  100,000 сом (KGS) на увеличение товарооборота. В ближайшее время, при помощи доходов от кредита, Кульмира планирует сделать ремонт в доме и в дальнейшем расширять свой бизнес.
texts.en: Kulmira is 52 years old, married and has three children.  In search of an additional source of income for her family, she started her own business of reselling agricultural crops in 2002.  Kulmira used an initial sum of 5,000 som (KGS) for the first purchase of potatoes for resale and was able to develop her business to have a working capital of 30,000 som (KGS).  The earnings from the business allowed her to purchase a UAZ car to transport potatoes.  In order to further grow her business, Kulmira requested a loan in the sum of 100,000 som (KGS) from the "Bai-Tushum and Partners" company to increase goods turnover.  In the near future, she also plans to use the profits from the loan to make repairs to her home and continue to expand her business.

loans.use: to increase goods turnover

loans.name: Africa One Group

texts.en:
Yona, who is in his mid-20s, is married with one small child.  He has been a wood cutter for five years now.  He works from 8:00 a.m. to 6:00 p.m. daily and is able to make a good monthly profit.  

This will be his first loan from Tujijenge Tanzania, which he wants to use for buying more wood and cutting more pieces to sell. 

His dream is to one day be able to start another business of buying and selling rice.

He will share this loan with his loan group "Africa One", which has a total of fifteen members who will hold each other accountable for paying back their loans.

loans.use: to buy more wood.

loans.name: Benard

texts.en:
Benard is 38 years old, married, and has two children. He does tomato farming to earn a living. He has been in this business for ten years and has employed two people. 

Since he joined Faulu Kenya, he has been able to save his income and hopes to expand his business in the future. He has applied for 40,000 Kenya Shillings to buy tomato seeds and fertilizer.

loans.use: to buy tomato seeds and fertilizer.

loans.name: Seng

texts.en:
Mrs. Seng, age 64, has been in agribusiness cultivating rice for ages. She has been blessed with four single children, two of whom now work in a garment factory as sewing staff. According to her experience, Seng is able to yield an income of $2.50 per day through her business to support the whole family. 

For now, Seng is requesting a loan for the purchase of a motorcycle for her employed children as well as for the use of the entire family. In the future, Seng wants to open a small seamstress shop from her home for her children.

loans.use: to purchase a motorcycle for her employed children as well as for the use of the entire family.

loans.name: Tal

texts.en:
Mrs. Tal is 33 years old and is in the business of selling fish in a local market of Baray district, Cambodia. She usually gets up early to buy fish in bulk from her frequent suppliers, which she then resells for a reasonable and profitable price. Presently, she has become a mother of two lovely young kids who attend school.

Tal decided to take out this loan in order to buy a used motorbike for the support of the business because she doesn't own any vehicle yet for her household and business use. She is very pleased for the loan given to her to improve her business as well as her living condition.

loans.use: to buy a used motorbike.

loans.name: Salimboi

texts.ru: Салимбой женат и ответственный отец двоих детей. Более 15 лет он занимается скотоводством. А также выращиванием картофеля и моркови. Все помогают по бизнесу. Салимбой хочет улучшить свои жилищные условия и создать уют для своих детей. Из-за недостатка денежных средств он запрашивает займ для покупки 5 голов крупного рогатого скота, а на остальную сумму хочет купить корм для скота. На полученный доход он хочет расширить свой бизнес.
texts.en: Salimboi is married and is a responsible father of two children.  He has been involved in animal husbandry for over 15 years.  He also grows potatoes and carrots.  Everyone helps with the business.  Salimboi wants to improve his living conditions and create comfort for his children.  Because of the financial means shortage, he is requesting this loan to purchase five heads of cattle and use the remaining sum to buy livestock feed.  He wants to use the resulting profit to expand his business.

loans.use: to buy cattle and livestock feed

loans.name: Rustam

texts.ru: Рустам молодой человек, который занимается продажей женской одежды. Он уже 18 лет занимается этой деятельностью.За товаром ездит его мама в Бишкек, каждый месяц. Он в "Арванд" клиент с 2005 года.Его жена занимается продажей материй для женского пошива, на вещевом рынке.У Рустама одно дочка и сын, которые учатся в средней школе города. Его сын помогает отцу в разгрузке товара, при завозе, ему 16 лет.Рустам хочет на полученный кредит привезти весенний ассортимент женской одежды с Бишкека.
texts.en: Rustam is a young man, who is involved in selling women's clothing.  He has been in this business for 18 years.  His mother travels to Bishkek for the merchandise monthly.  Rustam has been a client of "Arvand" since 2005.  His wife is involved in selling women's fabrics at a clothing market.  Rustam has one daughter and a son, both of whom attend the city's secondary school.  His son, who is 16 years old, helps the father with unloading the merchandise during deliveries.  Rustam wants to use this loan to bring in a spring selection of women's clothing from Bishkek.

loans.use: to purchase a spring assortment of women clothing

loans.name: Bagnintouena

texts.fr:
Bagnintouena est une femme âgé(e) de 26 ans. Elle est mariée å un électricien. Elle a 01 enfant  âgé de 1an 6 mois.
Bagnintouena travaille comme revendeuse de charbons de bois, de maïs et d’ignames  depuis 2007. Elle vend seule à la maison et sa difficulté principale est la concurrence sur le marché.
Bagnintouena a requis son premier crédit de WAGES afin d’acheter plus de marchandises pour mieux répondre à la demande de la population. Elle veut invertir les profits réalisés dans son activité. 
Dans les prochaines années, Bagnintouena voudrait développer son activité sur d’autres horizons. Elle dit qu’avec les profits, Elle prévoit d’avoir une famille heureuse.
texts.en:
Bagnintouena is 26 years old. She is married to an electrician, and the couple have an 18-month-old child. She has been selling charcoal, corn and yams since 2007. She works alone, from her home, and her main hurdle is the competition on the market. 

Bagnintouena is seeking her first loan from WAGES to replenish her stock and better meet customer demand. She plans to reinvest the profits in her business. 

In the coming years, Bagnintouena would like to expand into other sectors of activity. She believes that her profits will help to ensure her family’s happiness.

loans.use: to buy charcoal, corn and yams for resale.

loans.name: Jardines De Paute (Paute) Group

texts.es:
El banco comunal Jardines de Paute está formado por 7 socias quienes viven por diferentes partes del cantón Paute, cantón que esta ubicado al no res te de la provincia del Azuay, su clima y paisaje le han constituido en un lugar tradicionalmente turístico;  tiene un clima sub-tropical-templado. Las labores agrícolas ocupan gran parte de la mano de obra pauteña, es muy importante el cuidado de los huertos y el mantenimiento de viveros, se complementa esta actividad con la ganadería, en poca escala. En la zona de Paute se asientan algunas empresas dedicadas a la exportación de flores, otra fuente de trabajo es la producción de aguardiente y la manufactura de muebles. Su gente al igual que nuestras socias son personas trabajadoras y siempre están en busca de un mejor futuro.

Una de las socias de este grupo es la Señora. Inés, tiene 56 años y es madre soltera de  5 hijos quienes son todos mayores de edad, casados y viven independientes. La casa en la que vive es propiedad de uno de sus hijos.
 
La Señora. Inés cuando tenía 18 años siguió un curos de bordado, curso que le permitió tener su propio negocio, ella se dedica a bordar y tejer colchas. Como trabaja en su casa también se dedica a la cría de cuyes, pollos y cerdos.

Este es su segundo crédito que realiza en el banco comunal y lo va a invertir en la compra de hilo para continuar con su negocio. 

Su meta es comprarse un terreno.

El niño de la foto es hijo de una socia.
texts.en:
The 'Jardines de Paute' community bank has seven [female] members who live in different parts of Paute canton.  This canton is located in the north-east of Azuay province.  Its climate and scenery have made it a tourist destination.  It has a mild subtropical climate.  Most of Paute's workforce are engaged in agricultural work.  Orchard work and [plant] nursery maintenance are very important fields, as is small-scale livestock raising.  Some flower export companies have settled in Paute region.  Another source of work is the production of brandy and furniture manufacturing.  The locals, just like our clients, are hard-working people and are always searching for a better future.

One of the members of this group is 56-year-old Inés.  She is a single mother and has five adult children who are married and live independently.  The house in which she lives belongs to one of her children.

When she was 18 years old, Inés did a course in embroidery.  This enabled her to set up her own business, embroidering and making bedspreads.  As she works from home, she also raises guinea pigs, chickens and pigs.

This is Inés' second loan as a member of her community bank and she will invest her money in buying thread so that she can continue in her business.  Her goal is to buy a plot of land.

The child in the photo is the son of one of the group's members.

loans.use: to buy thread

loans.name: Batuli

texts.en:
Batuli is sixty-seven years old and the mother of five children. For the last six years, she has earned a living by selling charcoal in Malindi. She earns a monthly profit of KES 10,000 and was introduced to KADET LTD by one of our credit officers. 

The lady is applying for her third loan, for KES 70,000, to buy additional sacks of charcoal to sell to her customers. Batuli will use the profits made possible by this loan to help look after her family. Her goal for the future is to continue growing her business so that she can have a good and stable life.

loans.use: to buy additional sacks of charcoal to sell to her customers.

loans.name: Anita

texts.en:
Anita is married woman with five children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Anita is forty-eight years old and two of her children are in school.

Anita has a fish vending business in the Philippines. Anita requested a PHP 13,000 loan through NWTF to buy more fish to sell.

Anita has been in this business for five years. In the future, Anita would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more fish to sell.

loans.name: Monica

texts.en:
Monica is fifty years old and supports six people in her family. She is blessed with five children aged 25, 23, 21, 18 and 16. 

She owns a grocery store where she has carried out her business for ten years. She has requested a loan of KES 20,000 to buy vegetables, maize, beans and fruits.

The profits from her business will help her repay the loan. This is her first loan.

loans.use: To purchase vegetables, maize beans and fruits.

loans.name: Generosa

texts.en:
